Errantry-Monsters that work

By 321228322 on Saturday, August 21, 2010 - 08:49 pm:

Lately I've been studying monsters and how they listen in errantry.
So far I have tested 2 Panchos and a Naga.
The Panchos were fresh from the shrine, while I trained the Naga for a while.
The Panchos actually listed to me and did everything I say. The Naga however would go the exact opposite direction, which leads me to believe that dicipline and loyalty have no factor in the monsters effectiveness in Errantry
